Automotive Component Assembly Station

This system includes nest capture of multiple parts along with a torque-limited fastener drive system. Tools are counterbalanced and the bench height is adjustable to minimize operator fatigue. A network tie-in supports full part traceability.

Mitech Systems, Ltd.
